text: Hey, what are you reading this time?

It's a collection of mystery short stories~
This one also caught my eye at the book cafe.

That sounds interesting.
I might give it a read sometime too.
When you finish, could you lend it to me?

Thank you, I'll do that.
But you've been reading a lot lately.

Yeah, it's because of Chiyuki-san.
She said something really wonderful to me.

Amana-chan, you're also meeting the people
who wrote the books, huh...

I thought I'd like to read
more and more books.

meeting the people who wrote
the books along with them... huh

After hearing that,
I feel like I want to read various things too.

Oh, sorry
for interrupting your reading time.

Talking with Producer-san is also
an important time, after all.
